Find & Select Multiple Occurrences in IntellJ IDEA

Feb 23, 2024

Select multiple occurrences of the same word and change them all at once
For macOs Windows / Linux
Select one by one ⌃ G Alt J
Select all ⌘ ⌃ G Ctrl Alt Shift J
